thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: The Data Wonk Who Became a Coach

author: Jared Diamond
title: The Data Wonk Who Became a Coach
text:
The data revolution that reshaped baseball and sparked innovation far beyond sports also inspired an element of distrust. In marched an army of Ivy League-educated math whizzes, whose devotion to numbers threatened to upend decades of tradition and conventional wisdom that the longtime residents of this hidebound ecosystem held dear.
The Houston Astros, the defending World Series champions, believe narrowing that chasm could afford them a competitive advantage. True to their reputation as perhaps the most unorthodox organization...
